Name: ACHIEVEMENTS CITY
About the game: ------------------------------------------------------ You must build a big city in a Cyber ​​/ SCI-FI universe composed of several districts to grow the population through various simple actions. ------------------------------------------------------ Made by a lone developper, ACHIEVEMENTS CITY is a unique chill game fast and easy to complete. - 7 different keyboard and 3 mouse actions - A simple and minimalist decor that will immerse you in a Cyber ​​/ SCI-FI world growing with each of your actions. - See the different districts being built in front of you, control the risks of multiple innovations, activate aerial signals or even set up an electrical path. - Simple, short, relaxed, without the fuss and above all without Game Over, let yourself be carried away by its bewitching atmosphere.
